reviews.text:
Very cozy restaurant. Absolutely delicious Cocido Madrile√±o and the apple tart with cream.
Special thanks to our waiter Santos who went above and beyond.
Keep it up!

Good equilibrium among prices, quality and quantity!!. The taste of the ‚Äúcocido madrile√±o ‚Äú it was so good üòä!! The treatment was excellent, it was fast and kind!, thanks üôè. Very recommendable
One of my favorite restaurants in the world. Everything that came out of that kitchen tasted delicious. The atmosphere and decor is relaxing and rustic and the waiters are smiling and helpful.
Historic place. Nice ambient. Staff very friendly. Excellent food. Typical cocido madrile√±o. Desserts are delicious. Good price. I really recommend this place to enjoy "cocido"

Very unprofessional attitude from the staff. No one came to show us where to sit even when we waited for 10 minutes and this even though there were empty tables. No communication, complete silence and ignoring. Rude! We never managed to try the food because we looked for a place with friendlier people. Fortunately, there are many restaurants in Madrid with good food, polite service and a pleasant atmosphere, and there is no need to waste time and nerves with this particular restaurant.
